title: Why am I not getting Mastery Chests?
body:
I don't plan on spending real money until riot does some proper optimizing with the client and the random, GAME-BREAKING crashes stop, so I've been busting my ass trying to get S ranks on the new champs. Got 3 on Xayah, no chest. Got 3 more on other champs I never play and nothing. The games where I actually did earn a chest were mostly my duo getting an S. I haven't received ANY in the past couple months either. The last time I got one was in january.

 So what the hell? Why am I never getting one? I've got Keys, 4 keys (12 games with an S rank on my team). Not a single chest.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like you already got a chest for Xayah a while back.  More specifically, on April 19th in a ranked game where you went 12/1/7.  You can only obtain a mastery chance once on that champion, per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!
